TopicTitle: UNSC Sabre Starfighter (Weaponry to be added soon)

To fight those dastardly Insurrectionists, we are fielding some new pieces of equipment. Two fighters, to be exact. Any attempts to leak these fighters will result in immediate charges of treason and execution without trial.

Edited December 15, 2013 by andrew123

Okay, I can see the launcher well enough, but what about the actual Sabre? The only shots of it you provide are in the dark or from the back/side. There are no shots that actually show you what the Sabre looks like.

This is a great remake of one of the greatest ideas bungie ever had for halo reach (there were few good ones though so...), shame that the sequence was very modern FPS'ised, but still, this looks great and with a bit of modifying could actually be a decent SSTO.
I'll try taking more after finals are over. Glad people like the design though. :)
